Week 1

Hardware Goals

  • Test to ensure ePulse Feather ESP32 modules work by end of Monday
  • Research audio out on ESP32 using Arduino Audio Tools by Wednesday
  • Get functioning audio working by end of Friday

Software Goals.

  • Install and configure the PlatformIO CLI, as well as CMake and a few other C++ build tools.
  • Initialize the project.
  • Bootstrap the GitHub repository.
